about_the_game:
Classic Game with a Modern Twist

Usurper offers a unique take on the standard Chess formula. Start each game with only a King and work your way up to a powerful army by purchasing pieces from your deck.

Unique Pieces and Mechanics

Play with completely new pieces with interesting move sets. Be sure to finish off your opponent quickly or risk going into Overtime, where the board itself is damaged and the tide of battle can suddenly shift.

Choose Your Playstyle

Features 3 dynamic decks to play with: Kingdom (familiar and simple), Shogunate (forward facing and aggressive), and Empire (long ranged but slow moving). Mix and match units from different classes to create the perfect deck to crush your opponent.

Local and Online Multiplayer

Play with random players using premade decks or your own specialized creations. Create private matches to play with friends online, or take turns on the hotseat in local matches.

Roguelike Campaign Mode

Face off against the computer in a permadeath mode of ramping difficulty. Start with a basic deck, drafting cards after each success. Challenge unique bosses and upgrade your King with new powers. Clear all 10 highly replayable stages to usurp the throne.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04
  • Processor: Intel 64-bit
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2+, Vulkan capable

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS High Sierra 10.13
  • Processor: Apple Silicon or Intel 64-bit
  • Graphics: Metal capable Intel and AMD GPUs

name: Usurper Demo
short_description: Usurper is a turn-based strategy game with deckbuilding and roguelike elements. Wage war against your opponent using troops inspired by classic games such as Chess and Shogi. Create custom decks and bring them to life in local and online multiplayer.
